Headline: #48 South Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/47th
ShortDescription: 48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 51st, Ashland and 47th, due to street blockage near Damen/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#48 South Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, 51st, Ashland and 47th, due to street blockage near Damen/47th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express and #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at 49th/Lake Park
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express & 28 Stony Island buses are temp. rerouted via 47th, Woodlawn, Hyde Park and  Lake Park due to street blockage near 49th/Lake Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#6 Jackson Park Express and #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Woodlawn, Hyde Park and  Lake Park due to street blockage near 49th/Lake Park. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
